title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 200.8 - Certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 200.8 - Certification

State Regulations

The term
certification, as used in this

Chapter, shall mean the designation of an employee organization as negotiating
representative of employees in an appropriate unit by the board or by a local
impartial agency established pursuant to section
206.1
or section 212 of the
act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
200.8

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
